channel.title: K
channel.description:
In most kubuntu screenshots I see the K(start menu) Wondering if there's a way to change it?
thanks.

item.title: K
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:142759”]Yes, there is a way to change it.

google says replace ‘kmenu.png’ with whatever you want. There is probably another way to change it as well.[/quote]
Thank you good sir.

Read full topic
